problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,∠ABC=100°,则∠ADC=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is the inscribed quadrilateral of ⊙O, ∠ABC = N_0, then ∠ADC = ()
raw_answer:
解:∵四边形ABCD是⊙O的内接四边形,∴∠ABC+∠ADC=180°,∴∠ADC=180°-100°=80°．
故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了圆内接四边形的性质:圆内接四边形的对角互补；圆内接四边形的对边和相等．
